attributes.action: Stop selling noisey fireworks make silent ones law
attributes.additional_details: I have a dog as many millions have whose stress levels are up through the roof. It’s after 5th. November and they are still going in.. there should only be organised events with soundless fire works… ex service who suffer PTSD this is bound have an impact on their wel being also it’s about time the country start to look after their citizens.
attributes.background: The government should put a ban on fire works that make a noise and only allow soundless ones.. this has an impact on both animals and people who suffer PTSD

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition: 

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
